output: 
  bookdown::word_document2

```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)

htfm=function(ht) {
ht <- set_all_borders(ht)
position(ht)="center"
align(ht)="center"
valign(ht)="middle"
font_size(ht) =9
ht
}

hadley=c("tidyverse","readxl", "writexl")  
morel=c("tidyverse",  "flextable", "huxtable", "janitor", "rstatix")
zhang=c("tidyverse", "readxl", "writexl", "Matrix", "abind", "Rglpk", "CoopGame")
pkgs=unique(c(hadley, morel,zhang))
lapply(pkgs, library, character.only = TRUE)   #不能使用purrr。因为tidyverse还没有启动

m10=data.frame(x=1:4, y=5:8, z=9:12)

ht= as_hux(m10)

ht0=htfm(ht)

width(ht0)  = 1.2

```



```{r fht, tab.cap="Numerical results based on model (P)", echo=FALSE}

ht0 %>% as_flextable() 
```
